properties.name: 6th Grade Party @ Michell Goldstein's
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 I heard 1999 by Prince for the first time at this party and went crazy! - Neil

properties.name: Dacey KO's Bewtra
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 Dacey and Bewtra met here after school. I can\'t remember why, but he landed a punch square on the nose. Coggeshall shouts "Neeraj\'s nose blew up" And that\'s a true story.

properties.name: Dead Man's Cliff
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 Named after an incident in the late 1970\'s in which a drunken brawl between teenagers ended with one killing the other with a broken beer bottle in Tilden Woods Park. "Dead Man\'s Cliff" was right next to the foot bridge that crossed over the creek. -- Glenn

properties.name: Dinwiddie Sledding Hill
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 Built in 1982, this neighborhood road extension was the site of many numerous sledding races. It was by far the best sledding hill in the neighborhood, outranking both "The Bill Hill" and "Old Gate Road" hill. -- Glenn

properties.name: Eric Atherton's Patrol Post
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 Eric Atherton\'s patrol post on the outskirts of the neighborhood. Eric was the first recipient of the "Golden Patrol Badge" for outstanding work as a Safety Patrol. -- Glenn

properties.name: Ewok Village
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984

properties.name: In through the Doggie Door
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 11904 Hitching Post LaneThe Tomlinson House was always open when you forgot your key or wanted to view some mags, right Neil???

properties.name: Jimmy Fatagatti's house
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984  Jimmy Fatagatti\'s (sp?) house. The best neighborhood bully ever!

properties.name: John Brooks Steals Schoolbus
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 After stealing a school bus from Green Acres School, John Brooks tries to outrun the police. He ultimately drives it to the field at Farmland, where he is promptly arrested by the authorities. - Glenn

properties.name: Killer Kick the Can Games in the Cantor/Bewtra Yards
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 11804 Hitching Post Lane

properties.name: Neeraj Bewtra Causes Scandal of Shakespearean Proportions
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 While listening to a particularly suggestive recording of Franco Zeffirelli\'s film version of "Romeo and Juliet," Neeraj blurts out: "Oh great. Now Juliet\'s going to have to get an abortion." His comment prompts Ms. Delorenzo to suspend our reading of Shakespeare and substitute the Bard with a lame, standard sixth grade reading book, turning English class into daily torture. The incident also cements Bewtra\'s status as an outspoken rabble-rouser, the Sacha Baron Cohen of his day.

properties.name: Neil Falls Down the Sewer
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 11803 Hitching Post LaneA lost ball caused several of us to open a man hole cover to search. Neil did not see it opened an fell in. OUCH!!!!

properties.name: Old Farm Day
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 This large grass expanse between Old Bridge Road and Old Farm Pool was the original site of "Old Farm Day". -- Glenn

properties.name: Old Farm Pool
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 Old Farm Pool. The Old Farm Eagles swim team were the best in the MCSL for many years in the early 1980s. A-division. The tops. The Boys 15-18 Medley Relay Race of Glenn Houck (back), Jamie Moore (breast), Steve Beers (fly) and John Swedenborg (free) set the county record at the 1983 All-Star meet with a time of 1:51.98. That record held for 20 years, until Country Glen broke it in 2002. -- Glenn

properties.name: Old Man Pritchard's House
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 Located near the base of Dinwiddie Drive, stands the original farmhouse owned by the Pritchard family. The Pritchard farm originally encompassed all of Old Farm, Walnut Woods, Tilden Woods, North Farm, and Old Hickory Woods. -- Glenn

properties.name: Soccer Practice
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 F-ing Mr. T making us do leg lifts. My belly still is burning.

properties.name: The Big Hill
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984  The site of the "Big Hill". This is one of 3 big sledding hills that we all used to go to on snow days. You\'d get to it by cutting through Jonathan Shulman\'s back yard. -- Glenn

properties.name: The Whiffleball Field
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 This was the site of the neighborhood Whiffleball Field. (How cool is that? I\'ve never know another neighborhood to have its very own Whiffleball Field.) The field was recently razed to make way for the widening of Montrose Road. -- Glenn

properties.name: Thriller
properties.description: Posted by Farmland1984 Another 6th grade party. This time at Andrew Rogers house. He gets the award for most memorable invite: a cut out paper in shape of hand with glitter on it just like Michael Jackson\'s glove. - Neil
